Ganthagocchaka
Ganthasampayuttaduka
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
65.
1763Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ ganthavippayuttaṃ…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
